channel.title: How do i set loyalty tites to accs?
channel.description: Ok so i have the loyalty titles and everything but how do i set them? And also How do you change the color of the yell title you have like Admin,Owner,Mod,ETC.

item.title: How do i set loyalty tites to accs?
item.dc:creator: @iLL_Scape iLL Scape
item.description:
@iLL_Scape wrote:

[quote=“Storm Powner, post:4, topic:448400”]you need to edit them in the files in the character folder, or make a command for it[/quote] How do i make a command for it i want it to be donor only

Read full topic
